name: Cube Runner (itch) (BigMemerMan1)
description:
Cube Runner is a 3D level based runner game made in the Unity game engine. This game currently has 10 levels, and is on version 0.2. There are 4 obstacle types which consist of, a Trampoline, A speed boost pad, an anti boost pad and an ordinary wall obstacle that will give you a game over on impact. I will most likely stop development on version 1.0 or I will continue to update it but keep the updates to bug fixes and tweaks. No major updates after 1.0.

Controls:

A + D = left and right.

I've been working in the Unity game engine for quite some time but I've only just got back into developing so I decided to follow a game development tutorial that was created by Brackeys. This is my first game in a year and half.

Changelog for 0.2:

Dynamic menu

New obstacle types

Lighting bug fix

Player no longer has a chance of passing through obstacles
